books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers. Originally published in 1985.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME

books.author: by Wally Lamb
books.description: About to marry the woman who is her gallery owner, a divorced artist and mother must confront secrets from her past.
books.name: WE ARE WATER

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Now grown up, Dan, the boy with psycho-intuitive powers in “The Shining,” helps another child with a spectacular gift.
books.name: DOCTOR SLEEP

books.author: by Jessica Sorensen
books.description: Lila Summers and Ethan Gregory are close friends, but will they become even closer?
books.name: THE TEMPTATION OF LILA AND ETHAN

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The Minnesota investigator Virgil Flowers becomes involved in the hunt for an ancient inscribed stone smuggled out of the Middle East.
books.name: STORM FRONT

books.author: by Scott Turow
books.description: Paul Giannis, running for mayor of Kindle County, is accused of having played a role in the murder of his identical twin brother’s girlfriend — for which his brother, Cass, has already served time.
books.name: IDENTICAL

books.author: by J.C. Reed
books.description: Continuing the story of Brooke Stewart and Jett Mayfield begun in "Surrender Your Love" and "Conquer Your Love."
books.name: TREASURE YOUR LOVE

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Detective Michael Bennett, living with his 10 adopted children on a California farm, is pursued by the head of a Mexican drug cartel he once put in jail.
books.name: GONE

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL
